Class Switch

java.lang.Object
Devices.Device
Devices.Switch
Direct Known Subclasses:
Layer2Switch, Layer3Switch
public abstract class Switch extends Device
Abstract base class representing a switch with VLAN support Provides VLAN configuration and port assignment tracking
Version:
1.0
Author:
Izzy Kavanagh

  • Constructor Details

    • Switch

      public Switch(String name, String macAddress)
      Constructs a Switch with a given name and MAC address. Initializes all ports to default VLAN 1.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the switch
      macAddress - the MAC address of the switch

  • Method Details

      Sets the VLAN port mapping.

      Returns:
      the port-to-VLAN map

    • setVlanTable

      public void setVlanTable(Map<Integer,String> vlanTable)
      Sets the VLAN table.
      Parameters:
      vlanTable - the VLAN ID-name map

    • getVlanTable

      public Map<Integer,String> getVlanTable()
      Gets the VLAN table with VLAN ID to VLAN name.
      Returns:
      the VLAN table

    • getTotalPorts

      public int getTotalPorts()
      Gets the total number of physical ports on the switch.
      Overrides:
      getTotalPorts in class Device
      Returns:
      number of ports

    • assignPortToVLAN

      public abstract void assignPortToVLAN(String port, int vlanId, Topology topology)
      Abstract method to assign a port to a specific VLAN Should be implemented by concrete switch types
      Parameters:
      port - - the port to assign (e.g., "Fa0/1")
      vlanId - - the VLAN ID
      topology - - the network topology reference

    • configureVLAN

      public abstract void configureVLAN(int vlanId, String vlanName)
      Abstract method to configure a VLAN. Should be implemented by concrete switch types.
      Parameters:
      vlanId - - the VLAN ID
      vlanName - - the name of the VLAN

    • printPortVLANAssignments

      public void printPortVLANAssignments()
      Displays a table of port-to-VLAN assignments.

    • printVLANs

      public void printVLANs()
      Displays the configured VLAN table.
